Bumblebee:



Bumblebee flew up silently, landing silently.  Raising both missile 
launchers, he smiled.  Ramulus and Striker had that little worthless creature 
Transantulas pinned.  Pulling both triggers repeatedly, three stinger 
missiles went off at Ramulus back, two at Striker's.
